content: Use search LDAP filter to select groups that will be imported. Please note that only users from these groups will be added.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that provides guidance on using an LDAP filter to select groups for import. It helps users understand that only members of these groups will be added.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'استخدم تصفية LDAP للبحث لتحديد المجموعات التي سيتم استيرادها' is a literal translation and could be improved for better flow and naturalness in Arabic. Specifically, 'تصفية LDAP للبحث' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'استخدم عامل تصفية LDAP لتحديد...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: استخدم عامل تصفية LDAP لتحديد المجموعات التي سيتم استيرادها.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'يرجى ملاحظة أنه سيتم إضافة المستخدمين من هذه المجموعات فقط.' is grammatically correct, but could be more concise and impactful. 'فقط' (only) is redundant given the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يرجى ملاحظة أنه سيتم إضافة المستخدمين من هذه المجموعات فقط.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'İdxal' is likely a typo and should be 'İstifadə'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadə ediləcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "K výběru skupin, které budou importovány, použijte filtr LDAP pro vyhledávání." is not the most natural phrasing. 'Use search LDAP filter' implies a direct application of a filter, while this translation emphasizes using a filter *for* searching. The emphasis is slightly off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: K importovaným skupinám použijte filtr LDAP. Upozorňujeme, že budou přidáni pouze uživatelé z těchto skupin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation is split into two sentences, while the English is a single sentence with a note.  While not strictly incorrect, it's beneficial to consider restructuring for consistency or flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: K importovaným skupinám použijte filtr LDAP. Upozorňujeme, že budou přidáni pouze uživatelé z těchto skupin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Օգտագործել որոնման LDAP զտիչը" could be more accurately translated as 'Use an LDAP search filter'. While technically correct, 'որոնման' (search) feels slightly redundant and can be omitted for conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտագործել LDAP զտիչը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "կավելացվեն միայն այս խմբերի օգտվողները" is a literal translation of 'only users from these groups will be added'. A more natural flow in Armenian might be 'միայն այս խմբերում գտնվող օգտվողները կավելացվեն'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: միայն այս խմբերում գտնվող օգտվողները կավելացվեն

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "インポートするグループを選択します" (import suru group o sentaku shimasu) is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the filtering action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: インポート対象のグループをLDAPフィルタで絞り込みます。(Import the target groups using an LDAP filter.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "これらのグループのユーザーのみが追加されることに注意してください" is a bit clunky. It can be simplified for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: これらのグループのユーザーのみが取り込まれます。(Only users from these groups will be imported.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "해당 그룹의 사용자만 추가된다는 점을 참고하세요" could be more naturally translated as "선택된 그룹의 사용자만 추가됩니다." or "선택된 그룹의 사용자만 추가될 것입니다." The current phrasing is grammatically correct but slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 선택된 그룹의 사용자만 추가됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ໃຊ້ໄດ້ແລ້ວ" (used laeo) seems out of place and doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning of 'Please note'. It’s likely an unintended addition or mistranslation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove "ໃຊ້ໄດ້ແລ້ວ" and rephrase the sentence for clarity.  Consider something like "ສັງເກດວ່າ" (sang ket wa) or "ແດ່ໃສ່ໃຈວ່າ" (dae sai jai wa).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure is a bit awkward.  'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຈາກກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າ' (phu sai jak khum leo ni thao nan ja thuk phoem khao) could be more fluid.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to: 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຈາກກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າເທົ່ານັ້ນ' (phu sai jak khum leo ni ja thuk phoem khao thao nan) or 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃນກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າເທົ່ານັ້ນ' (phu sai nai khum leo ni ja thuk phoem khao thao nan).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'pentru' is repeated unnecessarily. The phrase 'pentru importul' can be shortened to 'pentru import'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta grupuri pentru import. Vă rugăm să rețineți că vor fi adăugate numai utilizatorii din aceste grupuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: It's more natural in Romanian to use a reflexive verb in this context. "Vor fi adăugate" is correct, but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vor fi adăugați numai utilizatorii din aceste grupuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආයාත' (aayata) is used, which is correct for 'import'.

The sentence structure 'මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එකතු කරනු ලැබේ' (Mema samuhavala sitina parishesilakayin pamanamak ethakunu karanu labe) is grammatically correct but could be slightly more natural sounding. A more common phrasing might be 'මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් අ එක්රින' (Mema samuhavala sitina parishesilakayin pamanamak ekarinu).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එක්රින.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation maintains the same sentence structure as the English, which is acceptable. However, Sinhala often allows for more flexibility in phrasing, which could lead to a more elegant translation.

The phrase "Upoštevaj, da bodo dodani samo uporabniki iz teh skupin" is a bit clunky. 'Upoštevaj' (consider) isn't the most natural way to phrase this. It's not incorrect, but could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Namesto 'Upoštevaj, da bodo dodani samo uporabniki iz teh skupin', bolje bi bilo 'Samo uporabniki iz teh skupin bodo dodani' or 'Dodani bodo samo uporabniki iz teh skupin'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' appears multiple times and is likely a rendering issue. It should be 'ће'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "da biste izabrali grupe koje će biti uvezene" is somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "za odabir grupa koje će biti uvezene".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite LDAP filter za pretragu za odabir grupa koje će biti uvezene.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The semicolon after 'uvezene' is unnecessary. Serbian generally avoids semicolons in informal contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite LDAP filter za pretragu za odabir grupa koje će biti uvezene. Imajte na umu da će biti dodati samo korisnici iz ovih grupa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sử dụng bộ lọc LDAP tìm kiếm để chọn các nhóm sẽ được nhập' could be improved for clarity and flow. The phrase 'tìm kiếm' (search) is redundant as 'bộ lọc LDAP' already implies a search filter. A more natural phrasing might omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc LDAP để chọn các nhóm sẽ được nhập.
